## gpioGetLineInfo() function

Returns information about a GPIO.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gpioGetLineInfo(handle: number, gpio: number): GpioLineInfo;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The GPIO device handle as returned by [gpiochipOpen()](./lgpio.gpiochipopen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

gpio


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The GPIO number


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[GpioLineInfo](./lgpio.gpiolineinfo.md)

Information about the specified GPIO
